704208f-a.title: Brooklyn: Flatbush Avenue - Empire Boulevard
704208f-a.text:
Flatbush Ave., at the N.E. corner of Empire Blvo. (Flatbush Ave., is
in the foreground).
About 1900.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

706097f-a.title: Brooklyn: Ocean Avenue - Flatbush Avenue
706097f-a.text:
At the intersection of Ocean and Flatbush Aves., showing the Brighton
Beach Railroad tracks and depot. (It was a horse drawn R.R. line. It was
open to traffic on July 2, 1878, running from Flatbush Ave. depot, to the
Hlotel Brighton at Brighton Beach. John A. Lott was its first President).
The hotel was standing as late as 190B.
1907.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
706097f-a.folder: Ocean Avenue & Flatbush Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

704138f-a.title: Brooklyn: Empire Boulevard - Flatbush Avenue
704138f-a.text:
Empire Blvd., south side, between Flatbush and Washington Aves., show-

May 1929.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
